HDG.IM.content: asking of the fundamental metaphysical question is historical: opens up happening of human Dasein in its essential relations > opens to futures to come (Zu-künften), thus binds back to inception > a non-derivative call/summoning of Dasein to its history, call to make a decision
HDG.IM.linkedContent: asking of the fundamental metaphysical question is historical: opens up happening of human Dasein in its essential relations > opens to futures to come (Zu-künften), thus binds back to inception > a non-derivative call/summoning of Dasein to its history, call to make a decision

HDG.BC.content: modern position is the “technological,” epoch is technological, already decided mode of world-interpretation: interprets possibilities for any human attitude, preforms them acc. their capacity for implementation > practical mastery of technology presupposes metaphysical subjugation to technology, grasp everything acc. plan/calculation, to secure what can last for longest possible duration > Nietzsche clearly envisioned that this will [of technology] would attain unconditional shape in 20th century, unconditional mastery of earth
HDG.BC.linkedContent: modern position is the “technological,” epoch is technological, already decided mode of world-interpretation: interprets possibilities for any human attitude, preforms them acc. their capacity for implementation > practical mastery of technology presupposes metaphysical subjugation to technology, grasp everything acc. plan/calculation, to secure what can last for longest possible duration > Nietzsche clearly envisioned that this will [of technology] would attain unconditional shape in 20th century, unconditional mastery of earth

HDG.BC.content: via Nietzsche, soldier and worker determine the actual [MOP], unique fusion: “type of humanity taken as measure by the present world-convulsion (Welterschütterung) [epoch] for its fulfillment (Vollzug),” metaphysical titles that name form of human fulfillment of being of beings now manifest, presciently called “will to power” [but it is not epochal for Nietzsche] [Heidegger on the sly]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: via Nietzsche, soldier and worker determine the actual [MOP], unique fusion: “type of humanity taken as measure by the present world-convulsion (Welterschütterung) [epoch] for its fulfillment (Vollzug),” metaphysical titles that name form of human fulfillment of being of beings now manifest, presciently called “will to power” [but it is not epochal for Nietzsche] [Heidegger on the sly]

HDG.BC.content: Being thoroughly common in all beings, thus most common [radical leveling of metaphysical privilege] > each being finds its equal (Being), can be compared (vergleichen), but Being never finds its equal, over & against all beings, unique, can’t be compared
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being thoroughly common in all beings, thus most common [radical leveling of metaphysical privilege] > each being finds its equal (Being), can be compared (vergleichen), but Being never finds its equal, over & against all beings, unique, can’t be compared

HDG.TB.content: saying of Appropriation in form of a lecture remains itself an obstacle of this kind [metaphysical obstacles that render such saying inadequate] > lecture has spoke merely in propositional statements
HDG.TB.linkedContent: saying of Appropriation in form of a lecture remains itself an obstacle of this kind [metaphysical obstacles that render such saying inadequate] > lecture has spoke merely in propositional statements

HDG.WM.content: “preliminary sketch (vorbereitenden Kennzeichung)” of our undertaking (Beginnens) > each metaphysical question always the whole range of metaphysical questions
HDG.WM.linkedContent: “preliminary sketch (vorbereitenden Kennzeichung)” of our undertaking (Beginnens) > each metaphysical question always the whole range of metaphysical questions

HDG.WM.content: nothing awakens for 1st time proper formulation of metaphysical question re: Being of beings > nothing not as indeterminate opposite of beings, unveils itself as belonging to Being of beings > agrees w/ Hegel’s “Pure Being and pure Nothing are therefore the same” [also quoted in HDG.BC]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: nothing awakens for 1st time proper formulation of metaphysical question re: Being of beings > nothing not as indeterminate opposite of beings, unveils itself as belonging to Being of beings > agrees w/ Hegel’s “Pure Being and pure Nothing are therefore the same” [also quoted in HDG.BC]

HDG.IWM.content: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]

HDG.QB.content: transcendence ambiguous for essential reasons w/in metaphysics > meanings of transcendence: 1) relation proceeding from beings & passing over to being 2) relation leading from changeable beings to an entity that is at rest 3) supreme entity itself > meta-physical in metaphysics = transcendence
HDG.QB.linkedContent: transcendence ambiguous for essential reasons w/in metaphysics > meanings of transcendence: 1) relation proceeding from beings & passing over to being 2) relation leading from changeable beings to an entity that is at rest 3) supreme entity itself > meta-physical in metaphysics = transcendence

HDG.QB.content: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

HDG.QB.content: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation
HDG.QB.linkedContent: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation

HDG.QB.content: surpassing (Überstieg) is metaphysics itself, not a doctrine, but fact that such surpassing is “given” > given in sense of brought onto path of its prevailing, destined > destiny of (objective genitive [control genitive]) metaphysics: incalculable fullness/suddenness (unberechenbare Fülle und Jähe) of what unfolds as surpassing > acc. this destiny, human representation (Vorstellen) itself becomes metaphysical > the surpassing that returns to beings, “the transcendens pure & simple,” is “the being” of beings
HDG.QB.linkedContent: surpassing (Überstieg) is metaphysics itself, not a doctrine, but fact that such surpassing is “given” > given in sense of brought onto path of its prevailing, destined > destiny of (objective genitive [control genitive]) metaphysics: incalculable fullness/suddenness (unberechenbare Fülle und Jähe) of what unfolds as surpassing > acc. this destiny, human representation (Vorstellen) itself becomes metaphysical > the surpassing that returns to beings, “the transcendens pure & simple,” is “the being” of beings

HDG.QB.content: people have tended to represent “oblivion of being” as if Being were an umbrella forgotten by some philosophy professor [Nietzsche, cf. S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: people have tended to represent “oblivion of being” as if Being were an umbrella forgotten by some philosophy professor [Nietzsche, cf. S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]

HDG.FS.content: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth
HDG.FS.linkedContent: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

HDG.FS.content: Sein: Nichts: Selbes? > essence of metaphysics: nothing metaphysical [overcoming metaphysics] > Heidegger’s word neither on side of beings, nor simply on that of being: speaks from where horizon of difference (Differenz) becomes visible: ontological difference as condition of possibility (Bedingung der Möglichkeit) for metaphysics [differance] > Heideggerian proposition (Aussage): is difference itself, speaks of difference w/out holding onto it, thus he has abandoned (verlassen) metaphysics
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Sein: Nichts: Selbes? > essence of metaphysics: nothing metaphysical [overcoming metaphysics] > Heidegger’s word neither on side of beings, nor simply on that of being: speaks from where horizon of difference (Differenz) becomes visible: ontological difference as condition of possibility (Bedingung der Möglichkeit) for metaphysics [differance] > Heideggerian proposition (Aussage): is difference itself, speaks of difference w/out holding onto it, thus he has abandoned (verlassen) metaphysics

HDG.FS.content: Marx (like Feuerbach): “criticism of religion ends w/ teaching that man is the highest being for man” > Heidegger’s Marx interpretation not political, concerned w/ Being in manner it destines itself: w/ Marx, position of most extreme nihilism is reached [what about Nietzsche?] > if man is the highest being for man, Being (as Being) is nothing (nichts) (nihil) anymore for man > to understand Marx politically: make politics a mode of self-production (perfectly consistent w/ Marx’s thought) (Marx’s statement decidedly metaphysical)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Marx (like Feuerbach): “criticism of religion ends w/ teaching that man is the highest being for man” > Heidegger’s Marx interpretation not political, concerned w/ Being in manner it destines itself: w/ Marx, position of most extreme nihilism is reached [what about Nietzsche?] > if man is the highest being for man, Being (as Being) is nothing (nichts) (nihil) anymore for man > to understand Marx politically: make politics a mode of self-production (perfectly consistent w/ Marx’s thought) (Marx’s statement decidedly metaphysical)

HDG.DL.content: ambiguity of “Being,” not metaphysical representation, but the presence of Being, presence of the two-fold (Zwiefalt), Being and beings > if we heed (beachten) this [ambiguity of twofold], phrase never becomes catchword (Schlagwort)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: ambiguity of “Being,” not metaphysical representation, but the presence of Being, presence of the two-fold (Zwiefalt), Being and beings > if we heed (beachten) this [ambiguity of twofold], phrase never becomes catchword (Schlagwort)

HDG.DL.content: since Being and Time, bring out Being of beings (not in metaphysical manner [overcoming metaphysics]), so Being itself will shine out: the presence of present things (Anwesen des Anwesenden), two-fold of two in their simple oneness (Einfalt) > language: the prevailing (Vorwaltende) and bearing up (Tragende) in relation (Bezug) of human nature to two-fold > man realizes (west) [his nature] as man by corresponding (entspricht) to the call (Zuspruch) [promise?] of two-fold, bears witness (bekundet) to two-fold in its message (Botschaft)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: since Being and Time, bring out Being of beings (not in metaphysical manner [overcoming metaphysics]), so Being itself will shine out: the presence of present things (Anwesen des Anwesenden), two-fold of two in their simple oneness (Einfalt) > language: the prevailing (Vorwaltende) and bearing up (Tragende) in relation (Bezug) of human nature to two-fold > man realizes (west) [his nature] as man by corresponding (entspricht) to the call (Zuspruch) [promise?] of two-fold, bears witness (bekundet) to two-fold in its message (Botschaft)

HDG.DL.content: [in metaphysical aesthetics] art work an object for our feelings/ideas, artist the subject related to his work as object: a treacherous framework (verfänglich), can capture (einfangen) all other kinds of experience of art & its nature > Iki is the gracious (Anmutende)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: [in metaphysical aesthetics] art work an object for our feelings/ideas, artist the subject related to his work as object: a treacherous framework (verfänglich), can capture (einfangen) all other kinds of experience of art & its nature > Iki is the gracious (Anmutende)

HDG.DL.content: thinking look (Anleitung) into Sage only beginning of path that takes us back out (zürucknimmt) of metaphysical representations in das Achten auf die Winke jener Botschaft, deren Botengänger wir eigens werden möchten [in the attention/heeding of hints, traces, whose message we would want to properly bear?]
HDG.DL.linkedContent: thinking look (Anleitung) into Sage only beginning of path that takes us back out (zürucknimmt) of metaphysical representations in das Achten auf die Winke jener Botschaft, deren Botengänger wir eigens werden möchten [in the attention/heeding of hints, traces, whose message we would want to properly bear?]

HDG.LP.content: via Trakl, apartness is spiritual/ghostly (geistlich), vom Geist bestimmt, but not “of the spirit (geistig)” (in metaphysical sense) > for Trakl, in “Grodek,” spirit is flaming, not pneuma (ethereal), but a flame that inflames, startles (aufjagt), horrifies (entsetzt), shatters us, the glowing lumination > flame is the ek-stasis (Ausser-sich), which lightens and calls forth radiance, but may go on consuming (weiterfressen) and reduce (verzehren) all to white ashes [cf. Derrida on absolute ash] > “Flame is the palest pallor’s brother” > Geist, for Trakl, as gheis (ghost), a being terrified (aufgebracht), beside himself (entsetzt), ek-static
HDG.LP.linkedContent: via Trakl, apartness is spiritual/ghostly (geistlich), vom Geist bestimmt, but not “of the spirit (geistig)” (in metaphysical sense) > for Trakl, in “Grodek,” spirit is flaming, not pneuma (ethereal), but a flame that inflames, startles (aufjagt), horrifies (entsetzt), shatters us, the glowing lumination > flame is the ek-stasis (Ausser-sich), which lightens and calls forth radiance, but may go on consuming (weiterfressen) and reduce (verzehren) all to white ashes [cf. Derrida on absolute ash] > “Flame is the palest pallor’s brother” > Geist, for Trakl, as gheis (ghost), a being terrified (aufgebracht), beside himself (entsetzt), ek-static
